name: Mars: The New Eden
description:
Mars: The New Eden is an incredible point'n'click adventure set in space!

Year 2077, before the end of the 21st century humanity has achieved amazing technological advances, which has allowed for faster and deeper space exploration. Enthusiastic billionaires in conjunction with space agencies immediately made the dream of colonizing Mars a reality. A few years later, the first human colony on Mars, New Eden, was inaugurated and fully operational. A name that evokes paradise, but things were not quite like that. Something went wrong.

Embark on this space adventure with Captain Rick to find out what happened in this long-awaited human endeavor.

Features

  • Full of amazing characters and puzzles!!
  • A mistery that will change the history of mankind!
  • Gorgeous pixel art!
